comments:
I've got an executable w/debug info where the entry point does not have any
source associated with it.

When I start debugging on this file, I get an error message. Log
attached.
Created an attachment (id=16060)
Nothing particularly helpful in the log since the exception was scensored
Created an attachment (id=16061)
I set a breakpoint on NullPointerException and got this. Smells related...
Is this related? I get it with the same executable...

The code of JavaTextFileBuffer has changed and there is no test case to check 
if this problem still exists or not. Looking at the code it seems the checks 
for null have been added.
Marking as fixed.
